creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture; formerly given to the Center by the artist
description: older male figure with salt and pepper colored hair at UR carefully poised holding calligraphy brush in PR hand over a pink and black image of a large blossom; across the table, a young female student mimics his gesture over her own black and white image; at lower center, a young male student with beard points at an open book with his PL hand

markings: LRC; label on L side when rolled, in  Japanese
title: Painter with Two Students
